permission_blocked_message: You need to give location permission to register on-site tree.
permission_denied_message: You need to give location permission to register on-site tree.
accuracy_info:
To improve your GPS Accuracy:
1. Make sure you are outside.
2. Walk around a little bit.
TreeMapper only works properly when the location is accurate to 30 meter.
poor_accuracy_message: Your location accuracy is POOR, which is not recommended. Are you sure you want to continue?
location_service_message: Location settings are not satisfied. Please make sure you have given location permission to the app and turned on GPS
